thread.title: Convenient and friendly
thread.title_full: Convenient and friendly - Review of Hyatt Union Square New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Vgs6820
title: Convenient and friendly
text:
I recently stayed here while visiting my daughter and her family, and was very pleased with the hotel. The staff was friendly and very helpful, the room was smallish but well thought out, and it was located a short walk from my daughter's apartment. Close by is Union Square and its subway station, so you can travel anywhere in the city. I'll definitely stay here again.
Room Tip: Courtyard studio room was very quiet. See more room tips
